benchmark_details.name: JEEB ENCH
benchmark_details.overview: JEEB ENCH is a benchmark dataset for evaluating the problem solving abilities of large language models, consisting of 515 challenging pre-engineering mathematics, physics, and chemistry problems from the IIT JEE-Advanced exam.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To guide future research in problem-solving using large language models.

data.source: Curated from the IIT JEE-Advanced exam papers from 2016 to 2023.
data.annotation: Problems were manually curated and formatted.

methodology.calculation: For different question types, scores are determined based on matching the model output to the expected correct answers.
methodology.interpretation: An accuracy score reflects the ratio of correct answers produced by the model against the total number of problems.
methodology.validation: Evaluation on various LLMs including GPT-4.
